attributes.title: Wow app ever
attributes.review: This app constantly spammed me with texts without my consent to do so. It made my phone super slow and glitchy. I recommend not getting this app it will mess up your phone! My phone has never overheated so much in my life!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app broke down my phone as soon as i downloaded it and after that i had to deal with all the glitches once my phone was back on and then a bear came and ate my cat. i cannot stress this enough, this app is AWFUL

attributes.title: Gave me a rash!!
attributes.review: Okey I thought I would love an app that shares the important news and facts surrounding our beloved dictator. BUT I WAS WRONG!! The navigation is so poor I got really stressed out and when I stress I get sweaty and when I sweat I get rashes so this app perpetuated that!! Do not recommend!!
